page.title: 17 A HUMOROUS SHOPPING TRIP
page.content: He helped{Mr. Smith}put on the{tyre. At last they were able to{go in}and {choose their units}for the{kitchen. This was not so easy as they were to find out. Mrs. Smith preferred{red {ones}while Mr. Smith liked the{wooden {ones.}They started{to argue}and soon everyone was{staring}at them.They finally decided to{buy}some which were entirely{different}to settle the argument. At last{everything}was packed in the{car}and they{set off for home. {Alas!}their{unfortunate shopping {expedition}was not over as the{boot of {the car}flew open on the{motorway}and they had to{draw up}on the{hard {shoulder}and{close it.}So ended our shopping day at the{SUPERSTORE.
